name: HYPER SQUARE (itch) (The Digital Ascent)
description:
HYPER SQUARE is a game inspired by Just Shapes and Beats and Geometry Dash in which you will have to dodge obstacles while listening to incredible music and each level has a different design with its effects and sprites where a HYPER SQUARE appears with a different shape

HOW TO PLAY (sorry for the bad controls):

move with WASD 

and space bar to do the dash (not stolen from Just Shapes and Beats)

 also around the player, there are 3 little squares those are your lives
